body_html:
How did you install tensorflow?

If you used pip on a Mac, you very likely want to install tensorflow into a virtualenv. MacOS is very protective of its system directories, so pip doesn't always work properly even if used as root.
body_text:
How did you install tensorflow?
If you used pip on a Mac, you very likely want to install tensorflow into a virtualenv. MacOS is very protective of its system directories, so pip doesn't always work properly even if used as root.
body:
How did you install tensorflow? 

If you used pip on a Mac, you very likely want to install tensorflow into a virtualenv. MacOS is very protective of its system directories, so pip doesn't always work properly even if used as root.
